title: EU to lower proposed tariffs on Tesla, other EVs from China: Report
description: The European Union is set to lower proposed tariffs on Tesla and other electric vehicles from China, reducing Tesla's rate to just below 8% from 9%. This revision follows new information provided by the companies. Last month, the EU had already reduced the planned extra tariff on Tesla EVs from an initially indicated 20.8% to 9%.
